wikipedia_page.main: Jeffrey Heaton (born 13 October 1943) is an English former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1960s and 1970s who became a St Helens R.F.C. Hall of Fame inductee. He played at club level for St. Helens (Heritage No. 799) (two spells), Liverpool City/Huyton and Rochdale Hornets, as a scrum-half, i.e. number 7.
